author: jih2nn
content:
I've opened a draft PR to `consensus-spec`. I've completed all TODOs in the spec and updated it to make it align with the EIP and actual implementation as much as possible. Please take a look into the changed spec to see if there is anything wrong cc <@363800010518822915> <@1035747431461167125> <@586161934425128960>  <@993802539856314398> <@358120958726373381> 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4351

It's still WIP and lack of several tests. I will be back to this after the Berlin interop.
